org.erasmusmc.utilities

Class NativeStringFileSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.erasmusmc.utilities.NativeStringFileSorter

  • public class NativeStringFileSorter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for sorting (large) comma separated value text files.
    Author:
    schuemie

      If semiSortFirstVariable is set to true, the file will be sorted so all rows that have the same value for the first column (in the given list of columnnames) are grouped together, but the order of values is random.

    • Field Detail

      • chunckSize

        public static int chunckSize
        Chunksize is the number of rows sorted in memory in one time. Higher chunk size leads to better performance but requires more memory. Set chunksize to -1 to let the system determine the largest chunk size based on available memory.

      • verbose

        public static boolean verbose

      • caseSensitiveColumnNames

      • sort

        public static void sort(java.lang.String filename,
        java.lang.String[] columnnames,
        boolean semiSortFirstVariable)
        If semiSortFirstVariable is set to true, the file will be sorted so all rows that have the same value for the first column (in the given list of columnnames) are grouped together, but the order of values is random.
        Parameters:
        filename -
        columnnames -
        semiSortFirstVariable -
